# ui-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description            | Type                                          | Default              |
| ------------- | ------------- | ---------------------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------------------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Input disable state    | `boolean`                                     | `false`              |
| `error`       | `error`       | Input error state      | `string`                                      | `null`               |
| `label`       | `label`       | Input label or title   | `string`                                      | `'Input text title'` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | Input placeholder text | `string`                                      | `undefined`          |
| `type`        | `type`        | Input type             | `"email" \| "number" \| "password" \| "text"` | `'email'`            |
| `value`       | `value`       | Input field value      | `string`                                      | `undefined`          |


## Events

| Event        | Description                             | Type                             |
| ------------ | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- |
| `inputEvent` | Emit event to parent component on click | `CustomEvent<InputChangedEvent>` |
